variable.name: cl_showkeycodes
variable.description: This variable enables/disables the output of informations to the currently pressed and/or released keys.

value.description: Switch off output of scancode/keymapping information (Default)
information about keys will be printed when the keys are pressed.
information about keys will be printed when releasing the keys.
information about keys will be printed when the keys are pressed and also when they are released.
